attributes.action: ask UEFA to allow Togo to play in the European Football Championship in 2012.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Togo have been banned from playing in the next two African Nations Cups. 

Their crime? Withdrawing from the latest African Nations Cup after 3 members of their squad were shot and killed whilst traveling to the games.

This is a total farce and should not be allowed.

Europe should stand by Togo and allow them to at least to be allowed to participate in the qualifiers for the 2012 European Championships.

What better message can Europe send to Togo that we stand by them and welcome them to play football with us.

Sport unites.

rejection.details: Please provide your full address when submitting a petition. Your address will not be published online.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
